definitions.text:
1. Height; elevation place or position; altitude; as the loftiness a mountain.
2. Pride; haughtiness.Augustus and Tiberius had loftiness enough their tempers -
3. Elevation attitude or mien; as loftiness carriage.
4. Sublimity; elevation diction or sentiment.Three poets three distant ages born; the first loftiness thought surpass'd; the next majesty; both the last.
